channel.title: Servers Dragon Weapons
channel.description:
These Models Are not mine!!!!! They are a Trial From someone on my server He told me to post them and see what people thought of them.... so here they are... I did help him through it so if u like it some of the blame goes to me... If u hate it some of the blame goes to me...
Battleaxe:
[IMG]http://i697.photobucket.com/albums/vv332/Buddy_budster/DragonBattleaxe.png[/img]
Longbow:
[IMG]http://i697.photobucket.com/albums/vv332/Buddy_budster/Dragonlongbow.png[/img]
Spear:
[IMG]http://i697.photobucket.com/albums/vv332/Buddy_budster/Dragonspear.png[/img]
Warhammer:
[IMG]http://i697.photobucket.com/albums/vv332/Buddy_budster/Dragonwarrhammer.png[/img]
Thanks, Buddy and MARS BARSV2

the axe looks like barbarien axe from rs models but reculerd
the hammer looks like one of the anger weps but im probly wrong[/quote]

They’re all from runescape, recoloured, and stretched points.
And bad colours tbh.
